title: Album Page, "Paving of Porch, San Bernardino, Perugia", late 19th century
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, top right of sheet: (inscribed in circle) 105; center below drawing: San Bernadino [sic] / Perugia / paving of porch;  to lower right of drawing: write for .... of door panels.
description: Horizontal sheet tipped vertically into binding.  Plan view of the patterns of a tilework pavement, colored in a light terra cotta color.   Graphite lines create a diamond pattern at rectangular diamond pattern at left.  To the right of this is a small border of single diamonds that frame cusped, four-armed tiles in the same color.  Above this is a small rectangular section with inscribed circles that the artist has used to lay out a pattern of trefoils radiating out from a central element.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Paving of Porch, San Bernardino, Perugia", late 19th century. Brush and watercolor, graphite on off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-173.
